item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 4th November
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is blocked paving across the road. The brickwork has sunk near the central divider line. Causes car to violently shake as impossible to avoid with incoming traffic, 4th November
item.description:
As this is a featured block paving across the road it is easily found. There is a similar area nearer turn into Golden Arrow way which has already been repaired (poorly with Tarmac rather than restore the blockwork)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green or amber traffic light is not working problem, 4th November
item.description:
Customer reports that half of the permanent TS are working at the location, whilst the remainder appear to be out. They are concerned as this is major roundabout.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Boughs falling from roadside tree infested with mistletoe!, 4th November
item.description:
A number of sizeable branches have fallen from this tree (between 55 and 57 Leckhampton Road, GL530BJ. (These could have seriously injured or worseâ€¦). The authorities started taking some mistletoe but as can be see from the pictures taken yesterday the job was left unfinished. There is also a large hole at the base (possibly a fox set). Very worried that the tree could fall apart and remedial action is urgently required.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sainsbury's trolley, 4th November
item.description:
Another Sainsbury's trolley has appeared at the top of Yeend Close.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous large, deep pothole. Could throw off a cyclist., 4th November
item.description:
Whittington Rd, Cheltenham GL51 6BT near Ben hall Avenue junction. Multiple very deep potholes near the junctions that become almost invisible in dark and wet conditions. Could easily throw a cyclist off their bike and cause serious injury or death.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Bibury Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
